text: Do Mastane is a 1958 Hindi film directed by Harish Tara. It stars Geeta Bali, Motilal, Nigar Sultana, Begum Para, Sheikh Mukhtar, Johnny Walker, N. A. Ansari, Murad, Tun Tun and Sapru. It has music by Hemant Kumar and lyrics written by S.H. Bihari, Indeevar, Kaif Irfani, Anjum Jaipuri and Balkrishna Sharma Madhup.List of Bollywood films of 1958 ==Plot== ==Cast== * Geeta Bali * Motilal * Nigar Sultana * Begum Para * Sheikh Mukhtar * Johnny Walker * N.
